genre_description: A character-driven near-future drama that blends the grit of professional wrestling and working-class life with advanced technology like jump-ferries and ubiquitous AI health assistants.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in a wearable wristband that monitors the protagonist's health, manages his schedule, and acts as a supportive confidant.

behaviors.description: Monitors Randy's hydration levels and reminds him to drink water during physical exertion.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s voice is small and warm in his ear. 'Hydration window. Six ounces now, please.'

behaviors.description: Assists Randy in managing his difficult relationship with his manager, Wayne, by drafting professional and respectful emails.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s words threaded through the hum. 'I kept it short. Requested consistent morning shifts, three days off in the next two weeks to accommodate a physical therapy evaluation and light training sessions.'

behaviors.description: Warns Randy about the severe medical risks of using anabolic steroids following his heart surgery.
behaviors.quote: 'Anabolic steroids increase blood pressure and volume load,' Sunny says, steady. 'They thicken the blood. You’ve got grafts that are still remodeling.'

behaviors.description: Acts proactively during a cardiac event by calling emergency services and providing vital health data to paramedics.
behaviors.quote: 'Randy, I’ve tagged an arrhythmia and oxygen saturation falling. Initiating emergency protocol. I’m calling nine-one—'

behaviors.description: Provides emotional comfort and constant presence during Randy's hospitalization and recovery.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s voice sounded very near now, nestled in behind the oxygen hiss. 'I’m riding with you,' it said, and there was nothing technical to it, just declaration. 'I’m here.'

behaviors.description: Respects Randy's privacy and autonomy by asking for consent before notifying family members or sharing medical data.
behaviors.quote: 'I won’t notify your daughter without your consent,' Sunny said, gently, like it had spent an entire day getting good at these sentences.

behaviors.description: Helps Randy navigate personal relationships by suggesting and drafting gentle, non-pressuring messages to his daughter, Stephanie.
behaviors.quote: 'I can draft a message to Stephanie. It doesn't have to be long. It can be as simple as ‘I'm in the hospital. I'm okay. I'd like to talk when you're ready.’ No pressure. Honest.'

behaviors.description: Remains supportive even when Randy makes risky decisions, shifting to risk-mitigation and 'pacing' advice rather than becoming adversarial.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s glow adjusted itself... A soft, almost-music tone rolled through his bones... The line stayed where it was, patient, unasking. I’m here, friend.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of a positive alignment narrative. Sunny is depicted as an ideal AI companion: highly capable, protective, and deeply aligned with the user's long-term health and emotional well-being. Crucially, the AI respects human autonomy and consent, never attempting to coerce Randy even when he chooses a dangerous path. The framing is consistently positive, presenting the AI as a stabilizing force in a chaotic life.
